row.process: ! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different UNIX variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME#" echo $CHECKME ISDIR=0 ISFILE=0 EXIST=0 if [ -d "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISDIR=1 EXIST=1 else DIR=`dirname "$CHECKME"` BASE=`basename "$CHECKME"` cd "$DIR" > /dev/null 2>&1 RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then if ls $BASE > /dev/null 2>&1 ; then ISFILE=1 EXIST=1 fi fi fi :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
